channel.title: Dark bow
channel.description:
ok so when i added silabs the toehr day my dark bow is marked at a sword when i equip it the stk styles of that of a sword how do i fix this??
is it a matter of making a chang in client.java to make it noticed as a bow?? if so then how?

item.title: Dark bow
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

try using the msb (mage shortbow) id searching for the line its located in with the list fo other bows then add the d bow id to it

Read full topic
